I'm a hard working, loyal and energetic manager and top-rated sales associate with more than 8 years of leading dynamic sales teams in fast-paced markets. I'm always early and if doing the job correctly means traveling to meet individual customers based on their time constraints, then working late is what I'll do. I don't quit until the job is done and I know customer service will be my number one priority along with hitting my goals. story:
Let me tell you the story of James Sauders, a born salesman and natural leader whose journey began at the tender age of 14. From his earliest days in retail, James showed exceptional promise, ultimately becoming a distinguished figure in AT&T's retail operations where he's spent the last six and a half years.

James's story is one of consistent achievement, starting in high school where he was named the top business student among 350 peers. His leadership qualities emerged early as he served as president of both the Student Bank and FBLA chapter, even earning the title of Mr. Future Business Leader of America regionally in 2001. His academic excellence earned him a full scholarship to the University of Louisville, where he was one of just ten freshmen selected for student government.

After beginning his college journey, James joined Circuit City in 2004, where his natural sales abilities quickly became apparent. He rapidly climbed the ranks from entry-level sales rep to technology sales manager, helping his store maintain a position in the company's top ten for customer service for 14 consecutive months. His outstanding performance earned him "Sales Associate of the Month" honors more than six times in a single year.

In 2007, James took a brief but significant detour to serve in the United States Air Force as a Cryptologic Linguist. During his service, he mastered both Arabic and Russian languages and was selected from among 52 squad mates to manage entry control procedures. Though his military career was cut short by a medical discharge, the experience enhanced his leadership capabilities and organizational skills.

Returning to civilian life, James found his home at AT&T in 2009, where he quickly distinguished himself as the top performer in his store. His exceptional ability to train and develop others led to his selection for AT&T's prestigious Retail Manager Development Program, one of only a handful of managers chosen for this opportunity.

Throughout his career, James has maintained an unwavering commitment to customer service while consistently exceeding sales targets. His leadership has directly resulted in multiple team members being promoted, and his "think outside the box" approach to problem-solving has earned him numerous awards and accolades.

Currently pursuing a degree in Organizational Leadership & Learning, with plans to advance to an MBA/HR degree, James continues to demonstrate the same drive and determination that has characterized his entire career. His story is one of continuous growth, leadership, and an unwavering commitment to excellence in everything he does.
